description: Request for Proposal (RFP) for the Supply and Installation of a new steel-bolted water collection tank and associated piping and equipment
full_summary:
**Parks Canada - Miette Water Tank Replacement Solicitation**

**Abstract**

Parks Canada invites qualified bidders to submit proposals for the replacement of the Miette Hot Springs water collection tank in Jasper National Park. The work includes demolition, supply, and installation of a new tank system, along with supporting process piping and ancillary equipment. The estimated value of this project is between $ 250,001 and $ 500,000, exclusive of taxes.

**Tender Information**

* Title: Miette Water Tank Replacement - Miette Hot Springs
* Reference Number: PW-23-01028207
* Amendment Number: 3
* Solicitation Number: 5P468-22-0249/A
* Publication Date: 2023-03-01
* Tender Closing Date: 2023-03-22T16:00:00
* Amendment Date: 2023-03-15

**Project Details**

The project involves the removal of the existing concrete water collection tank at Miette Hot Springs, followed by the installation of a new steel-bolted tank along with the necessary piping and equipment. The timeline for the project is to be completed by January 31, 2024.

**Optional Site Visit**

An optional site visit is scheduled for March 8, 2023, at 15:00 HNR, to provide an opportunity for bidders to familiarize themselves with the project site. Interested bidders are required to communicate their intent to attend with the Contracting Authority.

**Submittal Requirements**

Submissions must be submitted via fax or email, and it is the bidder’s responsibility to ensure that the submission is successfully transmitted. The acceptable email address for responses to the bid solicitation is soumissionsami-bidsrpc@pc.gc.ca. Late submissions will not be considered.

**Enquiries and Clarifications**

All technical and contractual enquiries regarding this solicitation must be submitted in writing to the Contracting Authority, with five business days prior to the bid closing date. The Contracting Authority reserves the right to decline to respond to any late enquiries.
